summary: Client asked Sarah to set a vision meeting. The PM asked what to call the project; Developer, QA, and Architect did not comment.

actions.task: Schedule a vision meeting requested by the client
Propose a project name for team review

risks.risk: No meeting scheduled and no project name decided, causing misalignment and delay to kickoff
risks.mitigation: Have Sarah schedule the vision meeting promptly and PM propose project name options before the meeting; set target dates for both actions
